identity.title: Counting the Number of Valid and Banned Product Codes (Case 1)

content.prompt: Suppose a hypothetical company uses codes to represent its various products. A product code includes, among other information, a character in the tenth position that represents the zone from which that product was made. Due to some reorganization, products from zone R are banned from being sold.\nConstruct a program that reads product codes from the user and counts the number of valid and banned codes entered. Make sure that the program handles all possible exceptions.\nThe program must ask the user for an input until the user enters STOP.
